div.div:
Eric - April 6, 2012 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 1.0.6
Did what other Apps did not!
This app worked perfect on my Verizon Thunderbolt. It is a growing problem in which contact duplication is occuring due to all the different ways they can be transferred and backed up. This app went through very easily and merged all duplicates for once and for all. Well worth the $.99!

DaveW - July 22, 2011 - Version 1.0.6
Saved Me, after Factory Reset: 1700 dups removed!
Verizon did a factory reset, to restore 3G service to my Droid 3: I had had 1740 contacts (mainly from my Palm). . Suddenly, I had 3440 contacts... Contact Analyzer 2 merged 7 contacts, and found 10 duplicates. Seeking a better solution, I bought Contacts Merger. I now have 1740 contacts again! THANK YOU!!!

solariz - December 21, 2011 - Version 1.0.6
Doesn't Work
Samsung Galaxy S2, merge process run nearly 1h and told me it's merged 350 contacts. At the end I didn't notice any difference after the merging. If I rerun the process it try to merge the same 350 contacts again. So frustrating that a refund isn't possible. :(

jimmy - June 2, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 1.0.6
Does not work on AT&T Samsung galaxy note
Tried it and it falls to merge the contacts.

John - December 30, 2010 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 1.0.6
The ONLY PROGRAM that has worked for me.. I tried about ten prior to ...
The ONLY PROGRAM that has worked for me.. I tried about ten prior to this one.. WELL WORTH MY DOLLAR! Thanks guys keep up the great work!

Tobias - March 23, 2011 - Version 1.0.6
App said it found 61 duplicate contacts... went thru the process of merging them. ...
App said it found 61 duplicate contacts... went thru the process of merging them. Checked contacts after it finished and it didnt merge them. G2.

cputrdoc - October 18, 2010 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 1.0.6
Missed some dupes, but overall did a great job.

epapa100 - August 3, 2010 - HTC Desire with version 1.0.6
Good UI, but lost 20+ contacts. Make sure to backup before usage. HTC Desire, ...
Good UI, but lost 20+ contacts. Make sure to backup before usage. HTC Desire, android 2.2

Frank - June 13, 2012 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 1.0.6
Doesn't work
This app ran for an hour and I still have multiple copies of the same contact

Blake - November 2, 2011 - Version 1.0.6
Just needs some tweaking
Pretty good, it merged most of my duplicate contacts, all but one pair of duplicates, which is fine. A little bug fix is all this needs.

James - January 2, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.0.6
Great app... just works. Saved me lots of time. HTC Desire HD.

Chris - January 24, 2011 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 1.0.6
Used Gmail's built-in tool to solve my duplicate problem. This seemed to work on ...
Used Gmail's built-in tool to solve my duplicate problem. This seemed to work on CM7 nightly build 11 incredible.

springnut - July 3, 2010 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.0.6
Had contacts all mixed up after switching from blackberry to Droid does a great ...
Had contacts all mixed up after switching from blackberry to Droid does a great job of removing duplicates from Google, Facebook and phone book

Ali - October 13, 2010 - Version 1.0.6
Thank goodness there is such a time saver app avaliable!

Big - July 5, 2010 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.0.6
Instantly merged duplicated contacts on my Evo without a problem. Must have app as ...
Instantly merged duplicated contacts on my Evo without a problem. Must have app as my contact list is made up of several sources which created dup.

Ken - March 21, 2011 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 1.0.6
DON'T BUY!! It eliminated half my contacts. HTC Incredible

Jamie - March 27, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.6
Finally!
This is the first App I have ever paid for, and I'm glad I did. I had been having lots of trouble with Google synced contacts appearing multiple times in contacts and in Voice Talk on my Samsung Galaxy SII. All fixed!

SILVER ISLAND - July 29, 2010 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.0.6
Evo. I tried to look at 400 duplicate contacts before merging and it was ...
Evo. I tried to look at 400 duplicate contacts before merging and it was stuck at that point. Refunded.

Tim - June 9, 2012 - HTC G2 with version 1.0.6
Not impressed. Ate contacts from phone rather than Google account, made phone ...
Not impressed. Ate contacts from phone rather than Google account, made phone numbers disappear while doing so. Could not refund due to low app speed.

Paul - June 16, 2012 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 1.0.6
Fails to merge contacts
It just deletes the duplicates. P O S

Tracy - November 9, 2011 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 1.0.6
Works great
Had this app on blackberry worked great there too

Christopher - March 16, 2011 - Motorola Droid II with version 1.0.6
Successfully merged over 470 duplicated contacts. Tried many programs. This ...
Successfully merged over 470 duplicated contacts. Tried many programs. This rocks! Close other apps first. Incoming calls kill it. Moto droid 2.2

j - July 26, 2010 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0.6
Lost some contacts. Good thing I have backups

Anthony - February 8, 2012 - Version 1.0.6
CRAP..
DOES NOT WORK AT ALL............

Mario - November 8, 2010 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.0.6
Saved the day after Missing Sync doubled up all of my contacts :)

Angela - March 26, 2011 - HTC myTouch 3G Slide with version 1.0.6
Worked great first time. Switched phones and can't find a dup to save its ...
Worked great first time. Switched phones and can't find a dup to save its life. Refund.

Shawn From Taiwan - May 13, 2012 - Version 1.0.6
Finally one that works!
After searching for some time, I finally ran into this application. This is easy to use and well worth the money.

james - April 29, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0.6
Cleared all duplicated contacts couple of clicks great app

Nathan - February 16, 2012 - Motorola Photon 4G with version 1.0.6
Did not work, VERY DISAPPOINTED
Do not install

Hawk - July 7, 2010 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.0.6
One stellar app!

Leni - May 2, 2011 - Version 1.0.6
Doesnt merge contacts as such, just deletes duplicate name entries, so you will ...
Doesnt merge contacts as such, just deletes duplicate name entries, so you will lose contacts. Uninstalled. Galaxy s.

MISHA - March 8, 2012 - Version 1.0.6
Didn't work. Error
I had it once before on my blackberry and it worked fine. Not on my Android though. :-(

Justin - February 13, 2011 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 1.0.6
Great app. Does just what it says.

Dave - May 1, 2012 - Version 1.0.6
Great app
I was very impressed on how well it worked with my Samsung Infuse. I was able to import my address book into Gmail then synk it with my contact list and clean up all the dupes as well as merge partial data.

Bill - February 18, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.0.6
Crap App!!!
Didn't do anything but take my money!

Jim - September 20, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.0.6
Worked excelent ! 5 stars for sure.

Myung - September 30, 2011 - Samsung Infuse 4G with version 1.0.6
Does not work on Infuse 4G
Get error message and contacts do not merge.

Wendy - January 24, 2011 - Version 1.0.6
It did not work.. and is nonrefundable!

Anthony - February 19, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0.6
Does justv what is says!

AisforAustin - April 21, 2011 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 1.0.6
Just want I needed for my contacts. HTC Thunderbolt

Scott - April 4, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.0.6
Does a solid job. Eco 4G

Joseph - January 9, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.0.6
Worthless

nix - January 8, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.0.6
Sux

Veronica - October 19, 2011 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.0.6
Needs work.

Liam - February 7, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.6
Shite
Does not work on SGS2

Frank - November 5, 2011 - Version 1.0.6
Works as advertised

Ed - June 29, 2010 - Version 1.0.2
Lost a few phone numbers...

Grendel - June 10, 2010 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.0.1
Installed,ran, and then started getting "com.google.process.gapps has stopped ...
Installed,ran, and then started getting "com.google.process.gapps has stopped working" error that I can't resolve.

Joseph - June 15, 2010 - Version 1.0.1
Installed and ran it then lost s few #s and got a com.google.process error ...
Installed and ran it then lost s few #s and got a com.google.process error that required a factory reset. I ended up using remove dupes in gmail.

cameronsaddress - June 9, 2010 - Version 1.0.1
Didn't work."Merging with error, group info null" Droid incredibly

Micah - April 18, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G
Didn't seem to do anything
Found the right records to merge but then didn't merge them. Cyanmod 7 on evo
